articles.description: Gujarat had earlier got 5.34 lakh doses in the first batch on January 12-13. Yesterday, a day when municipal corporations were not expected to run their Covid vaccination, there were more than 11,000 of them.

Ahmedabad: The districts have started increasing vaccination centres. The state government has ordered districts to start planning forward, asking them to measure their capability.
